GSD36manu2piu:7747: yāvat tan na vrajaty adhaḥ Mn_11.153[152M]d
GSD36manu2piu:7767: yāś ca kāś ca kudṛṣṭayaḥ Mn_12.95b
GSD36manu2piu:7772: yāṃ yāṃ yoniṃ tu jīvo 'yaṃ Mn_12.53a
GSD36manu2piu:7797: ye ca ke cin nirindriyāḥ Mn_9.201d
GSD36manu2piu:7800: ye ca yair upacaryāḥ syur Mn_3.193[183M]c
GSD36manu2piu:7836: yair yair upāyair arthaṃ svaṃ Mn_8.48a
GSD36manu2piu:7855: yo daṇḍo yac ca vasanaṃ Mn_2.174c
GSD36manu2piu:7884: yo yaj jayati tasya tat Mn_7.96[97M]d
GSD36manu2piu:7898: yo 'rthe śucir hi sa śucir Mn_5.106[105M]c
GSD36manu2piu:7913: yo hinasti na kiṃ cana Mn_5.47d
GSD36manu2piu:7915: yo hy agniḥ sa dvijo viprair Mn_3.212[202M]c
GSD36manu2piu:7916: yo hy asya dharmam ācaṣṭe Mn_4.81a
GSD36manu2piu:7944: rajo bhūr vāyur agniś ca Mn_5.133[131M]c
GSD36manu2piu:8058: rātriḥ saṃdhye ca dharmaś ca Mn_8.86c
GSD36manu2piu:8350: vikrayād yo dhanaṃ kiṃ cid Mn_8.201a
GSD36manu2piu:8488: vinā vā tair gṛhe vasan Mn_4.252[253M]b
GSD36manu2piu:8613: viśvaiś ca devaiḥ sādhyaiś ca Mn_11.29[28M]a
GSD36manu2piu:8752: vedās tyāgaś ca yajñāś ca Mn_2.97a
GSD36manu2piu:8797: vaiśyaś ca na surāṃ pibet Mn_11.93[92M]d
GSD36manu2piu:8965: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca Mn_12.98a
GSD36manu2piu:9124: śūdras tu yasmin kasmin vā Mn_2.24c
GSD36manu2piu:9227: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamad Mn_3.259[249M]c
GSD36manu2piu:9255: śrutaṃ deśaṃ ca jātiṃ ca Mn_8.273a
GSD36manu2piu:9268: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca Mn_2.98a
GSD36manu2piu:9312: śvā ca lihyād dhavis tathā Mn_7.21b
GSD36manu2piu:9354: sa eva dadyād dvau piṇḍau Mn_9.132c
GSD36manu2piu:9371: sakṛd dhanyāt tu taṃ svayam Mn_11.100[99M]b
GSD36manu2piu:9387: sa cet tu pathi saṃruddhaḥ Mn_8.295a
GSD36manu2piu:9393: sa jīvāṃś ca mṛtaś caiva Mn_5.45c
GSD36manu2piu:9407: sa tad eva svayaṃ bheje Mn_1.28c
GSD36manu2piu:9423: sa taiḥ pṛṣṭas tathā samyag Mn_1.4a
GSD36manu2piu:9452: sa trīn etān bibharti hi Mn_6.89d
GSD36manu2piu:9454: sa tv apsu taṃ ghaṭaṃ prāsya Mn_11.187[186M]a
GSD36manu2piu:9496: sa netā śāsitā ca saḥ Mn_7.17b
GSD36manu2piu:9579: sa mātā sa pitā jñeyas Mn_2.144c
GSD36manu2piu:9628: samair hi viṣamaṃ yas tu Mn_9.287a
GSD36manu2piu:9883: sa sa tāvad guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ Mn_1.20d
GSD36manu2piu:9944: sa hy asya praty anantaraḥ Mn_10.81d
GSD36manu2piu:9974: saṃdhiṃ chittvā tu ye cauryaṃ Mn_9.276a
GSD36manu2piu:10072: saṃsṛṣṭās tena vā ye syur Mn_9.216c
GSD36manu2piu:10110: sā ca svā ca viśaḥ smṛte Mn_3.13b
GSD36manu2piu:10111: sā cet punaḥ praduṣyet tu Mn_11.177[176M]a
GSD36manu2piu:10162: sārdhaṃ tair eka eva vā Mn_7.151[152M]d
GSD36manu2piu:10232: suptvā kṣutvā ca bhuktvā ca Mn_5.145[143M]a
GSD36manu2piu:10348: stenā syād yadi taṃ haret Mn_9.92d
GSD36manu2piu:10369: striyāṃ tu yad bhaved vittaṃ Mn_9.198a
GSD36manu2piu:10402: strīyonis tv eva kutra cit Mn_9.34b
GSD36manu2piu:10409: strī śūdras tu sakṛt sakṛt Mn_5.139[137M]d
GSD36manu2piu:10499: svakād api ca vittād dhi Mn_9.199c
GSD36manu2piu:10524: svadhāstv ity eva taṃ brūyur Mn_3.252[242M]a
GSD36manu2piu:10537: svayam eva tu yau dadyān Mn_8.186a
GSD36manu2piu:10584: svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ca Mn_1.101b
GSD36manu2piu:10612: svāmyaṃ ca na syāt kasmiṃś cit Mn_7.21c
GSD36manu2piu:10637: hatvā chittvā ca bhittvā ca Mn_3.33a
